abstract: The LZBITMAP compression algorithm, which is designed to exploit the vector instruction set of current CPUs.
overview:
## Discussion

The LZBITMAP compression algorithm provides compression ratios as close as possible to [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/COMPRESSION_ZLIB] and [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/COMPRESSION_LZFSE], with a lower compression cost. This compression algorithm is available only for the Compression buffer API functions, [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/compression_encode_buffer(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] and [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/compression_decode_buffer(_:_:_:_:_:_:)].

[doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/COMPRESSION_LZBITMAP] is available only on Apple devices.

# Algorithm.lzbitmap

**Case**

The LZBITMAP compression algorithm, which is designed to exploit the vector instruction set of current CPUs.

## Declaration

```swift
case lzbitmap
```

## Discussion

The LZBITMAP compression algorithm provides compression ratios as close as possible to [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/COMPRESSION_ZLIB] and [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/COMPRESSION_LZFSE], with a lower compression cost. This compression algorithm is available only for the Compression buffer API functions, [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/compression_encode_buffer(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] and [doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/compression_decode_buffer(_:_:_:_:_:_:)].

[doc://com.apple.compression/documentation/Compression/COMPRESSION_LZBITMAP] is available only on Apple devices.
title: Algorithm.lzbitmap
